metadata.dc:author: Riaza, M
San Miguel, M
Soler, V
Cazzaniga, M
Mora, E
Sánchez De León, L
metadata.dc:description: We report a preterm infant weighing 1,680-g with critical pulmonary stenosis. Pulmonary balloon valvuloplasty was successfully performed using a = 1.15 balloon/annulus ratio.
metadata.dc:title: Valvuloplastia pulmonar en un prematuro de 1.680 gramos.
[Balloon pulmonary valvuloplasty in a 1,680 g preterm infant].
